long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feel the adrenaline of the BMW M2 with our dynamic live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by the bold and sporty design of the BMW M2.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a stylish display that echoes the precision of BMW engineering.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Access racing-themed games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features inspired by the speed and style of the BMW M2.
